```{r}
data[9,-1] <- c(.28,.26,.26,.26)
```

 ## Status Summary for Gulf of Alaska Pollock in the Southeast Outside Area


```{r}
# using built in example data 
data <- safe::tier3[c(1:3,8:16), ]
data[1,-1] <- 0.3
data[2,-1] <- 5 # tier
data[3,1] <- 'Biomass (t)'
data[3,-1] <- c(45103, 45103,50500,50500)
data[4,-1] <- c(.3,.3,.3,.3)
data[5,-1] <- c(.23,.23,.23,.23) 
data[6,-1] <- c(.23,.23,.23,.23) 
data[7,-1] <- c(13531,13531,15150,15150)
data[8,-1] <- c(10148,10148,11363,11363)
data[9,-1] <- c(10148,10148,11363,11363)

safe::main_table(data=data, year=year, tier=5)
```
